content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was negotiating the rental price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Response] I did not agree on a final price because I wanted to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible, and the potential tenant was offering a price that was lower than what I was hoping for.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Response] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner at 8.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Response] I did not feel discriminated or offended because the conversation was respectful and focused on the topic of negotiation, which was the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt
